contents: *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2023.02.10. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) This regulation shall enter into force from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. Article 2 (Transitional Measures) ① Organizations subject to demotion as they fall under Article 6 (2) of this regulation shall be subject to demotion for three years from the date of enforcement of the revised regulations. Delegation is postponed. ② The reflection of the evaluation results under Article 7, Paragraph 3 of this regulation shall apply from the evaluation results from the year of enforcement of the amendment.
